overview: Colleen is the alias of French artist CÃ©cile Schott, who after a long period of silence, in 2013 returned to activity with The Weighing of the Heart (Second Language), a surprising work that represented another ambitious step forward in a career in constant evolution. The video for Humming Fields, one of the album's tracks, was a new collaboration between the French artist and Japanese filmmaker Takashi Makino.
title: Humming Fields
